text:
Hi all, Rent Bridge is looking for *a full-time Front End Web Developer with HubSpot experience*.

Rent Bridge provides process automation and marketing automation for the Property Management and Real Estate industries. Your role will seek to provide the ability to design, develop, deploy, and monitor our client web services and solutions scale and with ease. This role will only be limited by the bounds of your own creativity.

As a Front End Web Developer at Rent Bridge you will be responsible for creating and maintaining client-facing websites we have designed. The role requires great English communication with both management and other developers/designers.

*Responsibilities*
The successful candidate will:
• Have a deep understanding of HTML, CSS, JS, and HubL
• Develop secure, high-quality code that can be maintained over time
• Create reuseable HubSpot templates and modules
• Resolve problems and roadblocks as they occur
• Be a patient self-starter, able to spot data anomalies and troubleshoot software data flows
• Interact with internal and external peers to complete information related to assigned activities
_Rent Bridge is a technology services company in the Property Management industry headquartered in McKinney, Texas with teams across the globe. This position will be held in the McKinney, Texas office._

DM for more details or submit your Resume/CV here: <https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2284883483/>
